Articles.Content:
Show off your prized works of astronomical art! I want to see what ships you have flying around your fleets! The bigger, the better! (The smaller things can still be appreciated!) If you care to, you can include how many parts it is / how much it weighs/ what its purpose is in the fleet, etc.

Here are a couple of my own both of which are my pride and joy!

The sleek K.S.S. Hercules

Also good as an external cargo ship

The Mothership / Flagship / Capital ship, The K.S.S. Odyssey (took ~20 attempts to get in orbit, but after a structural overhaul, she finally went up without a hitch) 1200 parts! Not a clue what it weighs lol. 2 large cargo / docking bays, 10 small cargo compartments, 31 crew capacity.

-Captain Kirkbal

(if my pics aren't loading, it's because I haven't a clue what I'm doing... )

Hello Captain Kirkbal and welcome to our forum.

I'm sorry to dump a bucket of cold water on your first post, but we already have a number of threads for showing off different kinds of ships, so this thread has been closed for the sake of keeping the forum tidy. We'd be pleased to see your designs shared in the other threads, though.
